body_html:
@branquinhoaa The export works now!

  • I think Project Tags are not being exported.
  • Please rename the button "Download team's preferences" to "Download teams' preferences".
  • Will the last exported column "Terms accepted" work after this PR: #812 ? Could you please check this?
body_text:
@branquinhoaa The export works now!

I think Project Tags are not being exported.
Please rename the button "Download team's preferences" to "Download teams' preferences".
Will the last exported column "Terms accepted" work after this PR: #812 ? Could you please check this?
body:
@branquinhoaa The export works now!
 - I think Project Tags are not being exported.
 - Please rename the button "Download team's preferences" to "Download teams' preferences".
 - Will the last exported column "Terms accepted" work after this PR: https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/pull/812 ? Could you please check this?
